channel.title: NMS:PNFP on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:PNFP on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Pinnacle Agrees to Buy Synovus in $8.6 Billion Stock Deal
item.description: Pinnacle Financial Partners Inc. agreed to acquire Synovus Financial Corp. in an all-stock transaction valued at $8.6 billion, potentially setting off a wave of banking M&A.

item.title: Pinnacle Agrees to Buy Synovus in $8.6 Billion Stock Deal
item.description: Pinnacle Financial Partners Inc. agreed to acquire Synovus Financial Corp. in an all-stock transaction valued at $8.6 billion, potentially setting off a wave of banking M&A.

item.title: Pinnacle Shares Drop Most in Five Years on Deal to Buy Synovus
item.description: Pinnacle Financial Partners Inc. shares plunged the most in more than five years after the bank agreed to buy Synovus Financial Corp. in an all-stock transaction valued at $8.6 billion.

item.title: Pinnacle Shares Drop Most in Five Years on Deal to Buy Synovus
item.description: Pinnacle Financial Partners Inc. shares plunged the most in more than five years after the bank agreed to buy Synovus Financial Corp. in an all-stock transaction valued at $8.6 billion.
